title.value: Biochemical status of cattle and swine in the Belorussian farms by the results of blood serum research in 2012
Биохимический статус организма крупного рогатого скота и свиней хозяйств Республики Беларусь по результатам исследования сыворотки крови за 2012 год

journal.title: Epizootiology, Immunobiology, Pharmacology, Sanitary Science : international scientific and practical journal

person.name: Kuchinski, M.P., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was presented results of analysis of veterinary research laboratories for the study of the most important biochemical blood of pigs and cattle farms in 2012. In course of the study there were analysed the dissemination of metabolic disorders in cattle and swine. The analysis has shown that in the two species there were much prevalent metabolic disorders, а lack of essential nutrients and bioactive substances. The results of biochemical studies of blood samples of pigs and cattle showed widespread metabolic disorders, notably dominated by pathological conditions caused by a diet deficient in essential nutrients and biologically active substances. Imbalance of diets of dry cows and heifers with the normalized components of feeds caused not only the metabolic disorders but also low immunobiological immunity of newborn calves to adverse environmental factors.
